DOC.brief_title: High Dose Camptothecin-11 (CPT-11) in Recurrent Unresectable Malignant Glioma
DOC.detailed_description: This is a phase I/II study of high dose irinotecan in patients with recurrent unresectable malignant glioma on steroids/anti-epileptics. The purpose is to compare the response to treatment and side effects associated with high dose irinotecan in patients with recurrent brain tumors.
DOC.criteria: recurrent, unresectable primary CNS neoplasm per MRI ECOG status of 2 or less no prior therapy with camptothecans on an enzymeinducing antiepileptic
